General.Name: Wuhan Sante Cableway Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuhan Sante Cableway Group Co., Ltd. operates in the tourism industry in China. The company invests in, constructs, and operates approximately 20 sightseeing ropeway and scenic spots projects, including Huashan cableway in Shaanxi; Qiandao Lake cableway in Zhejiang; Fanjing Mountain scenic spot in Guizhou; and Monkey Island scenic spot in Hainan. It also operates a tourism complex. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Wuhan, China.

4.Name: Mr. Zheng  Cao
4.Title: VP & Sec. of the Board of Directors
